column4: hmm... now medibuntu shows in synaptic as a 3rd party source.. it's checked  but libdvdcss2 is still not found when I search for it
nvm.. cmdline works fine.. screw synaptic
you have to "refresh".. use the button in synaptic or sudo apt-get update
yes.. it's not there. it's in the medibuntu repo's..
